[ library(ic) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

?ExprX $> ?ExprY

ExprX is strictly greater than ExprY.
ExprX
Arithmetic expression
ExprY
Arithmetic expression

Description

Constrains ExprX to be strictly greater than ExprY. Alternate form of ic:(ExprX > ExprY).

See Also
